title: JUSTICE (BAND) NEW LANDS FONT ID PLEASE URGENT
content:
I'm looking urgently for the font used as the titles in the JUSTICE 'NEW LANDS' Music Video, attached.

Help greatly appreciated and repayed (especially if you can help me get this font)

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8DgAfs4FutI

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015152858im_/http:/typophile.com/files/NEW%20LANDS_5550.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [NEW LANDS.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015152858/http:/typophile.com/files/NEW%20LANDS.jpg) | 56.21 KB |
author: nicolasrandall

comments.content:
I think you might be right defiantone, thank-you so much. We were thinking it might have been: [Bureau Grot Wide Ultra Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015152858/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/bureau-grot/wide-ultra-black/)  
But the E was not right.

Any other thoughts anyone before we buy this?
